title: Trapunto Fragment, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: trapunto with satin and knot stitches on plain weave, drawnwork
description: Fragment from a skirt or bedcover of fine cream-white quilting and embroidery with drawnwork details on linen. Ground is quilted with diagonal cross bars made from cord inserted in narrow ridges. Sections of large scale floral motifs, pomegranate and foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trapunto Fragment, early 18th century.Medium: linen
Technique: trapunto with satin and knot stitches on plain weave, drawnwork. 1962-28-1.
